Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2009 06:04PM AmandaP wrote: Wow- I just read all of your posts. Liane- I am so sorry that you didn't get the news you were hoping to hear. But thank you so much for posting the specifics of your results. They look so confusing. If my results are not benign I am sure I am going to have to do lots of research.  Clarice and Karen- keep us posted.  Hoping for all of us! So I am a teacher as well- boy the first week of school is a perfect time to have to wait for biopsy results- I have been so busy/distracted- until time to sleep that is.
Posts.Title: Waiting and hoping Chickadee AmandaP
